body.p: Which of the following is true about Principal Component Analysis:

multiple_choice.choice: You standardize your data before performing principal component analysis because the technique is sensitive to variances in the data.
PCA does not maximize the variance of the data.
PCA is considered a non-linear transformation technique.

feedback.p: Correct: When you transform your data to the same scale, you will not have a situation were values with larger scales dominate the values with small scales.
Incorrect: PCA will maximize the variance of data.
Incorrect: It is a linear transformation that maps data from a high dimensional space to a lower dimensional space.

feedback.p: Correct: Dimension reduction is useful in removing variables that are not useful using mathematical modeling.
Incorrect: This is a method to drop data but you should use a method that can justify the reasoning behind removing these variables.
Incorrect: This will not be useful in reducing dimensions.
